data.name: Grant Industries
data.description: Grant Industries specializes in the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of textile, cosmetic, and performance specialty chemicals. We serve all major global cosmetic markets with a portfolio of award-winning products, cutting-edge research and personalized customer care. Our state-of-the-art ingredients are designed to improve your product's skin feel, including polysilicone-11 elastomer gels, silicone/active powders, microsphere powders, surfactants, UV dispersions, specialty silicone fluids and formulated cosmetic ingredients.

data.name: Granactive™ Retinoid
data.description: Granactive™ Retinoid is a multi-functional product that functions as an anti-acne agent, anti-aging agent, and carrier. Benefit claims include anti-aging effects, low irritation, sun protection, anti-acne properties, and UV protection. It's intended for use in anti-aging and anti-acne beauty treatments, providing low-irritation, effective active delivery in daily maintenance applications. Additionally, it helps reduce the effects of UV-induced skin damage and clears acne-related symptoms.

data.name: Gransurf™ 67
data.description: Gransurf™ 67 is a multi-functional product designed to serve as an emulsifier for water-in-oil (W/O) and water-in-silicone (W/Si) emulsions, as well as a nonionic surfactant. With an HLB value of approximately 4.5, it offers increased heat stability and an effective cost-performance balance. It finds applications in various products, including facial creams, body lotions, and liquid foundations.

data.name: Gransolve™ DMI
data.description: Gransolve™ DMI is designed to function as a solvent and stands as a pure and easily formulated solution. Derived sustainably from renewable corn sugar, Gransolve™ DMI is instrumental in stabilizing, solvating, and delivering active ingredients into the skin. This attribute translates to heightened efficacy and performance attributes, extended over a longer duration. Gransolve™ DMI is a globally accessible resource suitable for personal care, sun care, and topical pharmaceutical applications across all quantities.

data.name: Granactive™ ACNE
data.description: Granactive™ ACNE is a product that functions as an anti-acne agent, antimicrobial agent, and soothing agent. Benefit claims include anti-acne effects, promoting healthy-looking skin, antimicrobial properties, soothing effects, and skin smoothing. It effectively accesses pores for maximum performance and includes rice bran, Boswellia Serrata, and honey extracts to soothe and smooth the skin.

data.name: Vegelight™ 1214LC
data.description: Vegelight™ 1214LC is an emollient sourced from vegetable oils. This product is clear and colorless, with volatility characteristics similar to petroleum-derived isododecane and synthetically-derived cyclomethicones. With versatile applications in skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, antiperspirant/deodorant, and hair care formulations, it proves to be an ideal choice for a diverse array of products.

data.name: Gransil™ PSQ
data.description: Gransil™ PSQ is designed to enhance esthetics and offers a range of benefits that redefine your product experience. With anti-aging properties and wrinkle refinement, it ensures a superior skin feel and a silky, elegant touch. This versatile powder brings non-tackiness and non-thickening effects, along with remarkable water repellency and resistance. Embrace the power of Gransil PSQ to create skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care formulations.

data.name: Gransil™ VX-419
data.description: Gransil™ VX-419 is a versatile ingredient that acts as a moisturizing agent and softener. This innovation is a short-chain silicone capped with a PEG-12 group, showcasing 100% water solubility. Perfect for aqua toners, light lotions, and cleansing wipes, Gransil VX-419 boasts robust moisturizing capabilities and imparts an ultra-light skin sensory experience. Its uniqueness lies in providing a non-tacky, non-greasy feel, setting it apart from typical humectants like glycerin and polyglycols. The slight foaming property enhances its suitability for hygienic wipes, especially in the realm of baby care.

data.name: Gransurf™ 90
data.description: Gransurf™ 90 is a versatile product that functions as an emulsifier for both water-in-oil (W/O) and water-in-silicone (W/Si) emulsions, as well as a nonionic surfactant. With an HLB value of approximately 5, it offers broad compatibility with UV filters and oils due to its branched C16 chains. Primarily designed for personal care applications within the beauty and care sectors, including bath and shower products, color cosmetics, hair care, skincare, sun care, and treatment products.

data.name: Granpremul™ 1005
data.description: Granpremul™ 1005 is a convenient solution as a moisturizing agent. This pre-emulsified silicone elastomer base is formulated for effortless integration into personal care formulations. With its pourable and pump-friendly nature, Granpremul 1005 streamlines processes by eliminating the need for pre-mixing before kettle processing.

content_blocks.html:
The simple (and effective) way to load silicone elastomers into water-based formulations; water-coated GRANSIL SiW ELASTOMER GELS are the new vehicle of choice for creating personal care products. Technically GRANSIL SiW ELASTOMER GELS offer formulators the ideal opportunity for loading high levels of Polysilicone-11 elastomer into water-based gel structures with minimal use of emulsifiers (at levels below 0.5%), and by cold processing methods. Stable formulations achieved with such low levels of emulsifiers also serve as excellent delivery-bases for active ingredients.

The challenges of dispersing standard silicone elastomers in water are well known. Standard silicone elastomers can be very difficult to disperse uniformly in external water phase emulsions or aqueous gels due to their inability to fit into o/w micelles, and general hydrophobic incompatibility with water. Often when processing, excessive levels of surfactants and high shear energy is required to disperse and maintain particles to a stable state. High concentrations of surfactants (which coat particles to maintain a dispersion) unfortunately reduce the elastomer sensory properties by creating tackiness. Surfactants are also more likely to cause skin irritation or some level of barrier disruption. The unique design of versatile GRANSIL SiW ELASTOMER GELS resolves these challenges.

GRANSIL SiW ELASTOMER GELS can be formulated to offer unique sensory benefits with a water-topowder break on application. The outer water phase cools, soothes and hydrates skin on contact, while seconds later silicone elastomer particles release from a gel matrix to fill lines and even complexion with soft powder-like texture. GRANSIL SiW ELASTOMER GELS can also be used to improve sensory esthetics of existing emulsions with easy post-addition. Grant Industries offers a wide range of gels from high volatility to non-volatile meeting the sensory and regulatory requirements of any formulation project. Applications include skin care, daily wear, color cosmetics, sun care, body care, and hair care.

Challenges of dispersing standard silicone elastomers in water:

  • Silicone elastomers can be very difficult to disperse uniformly in external water phase emulsions or aqueous gels due to their inability to fit into o/w micelles and general hydrophobic incompatibility with water
  • Often excessive levels of surfactants and high shear energy is required to disperse and maintain particles to a stable state
  • High concentrations of surfactants (which coat particles to maintain a dispersion) unfortunately reduce the elastomer sensory properties by creating tackiness. Surfactants are also more likely to cause skin irritation or some level of barrier disruption and TEWL

Objectives for silicone elastomers in water:

  • Offer a highly uniform and concentrated dispersion of elastomer particles in water with minimal use of surfactants
  • Offer a formulation dial to maximize sensory performance
  • Allow the possibility for cold process and energy saving applications
  • Improve material cost and efficiency
    • By increasing sensory performance
    • By reducing cost of emulsifiers in a formulation
    • By reducing cost of high energy/heat manufacturing

content_blocks.key: Gransil SiW Technology Solution: Providing the Ideal Silicone Elastomer-in-water System
content_blocks.html:
• High load of Polysilicone-11
  • Low external water phase (of SiW material), ~10%
  • Ultra-low surfactant requirement
  • Extremely stable and uniform dispersions
  • Maximum sensory performance
  • Soft inert non-sensitizing, and non-irritating swellable globules
content_blocks.display_name: Gransil SiW Technology Solution: Providing the Ideal Silicone Elastomer-in-water System

content_blocks.key: Gransil SiW Technology: Formulation Benefits, Energy Savings, Applications and Suggested Uses
content_blocks.html:
Formulation Benefits:

  • Ease of use in formulation and manufacturing scale up
  • Minimal use of emulsifiers offers great bio-compatibility
  • Highly compatible with commonly used rheology modifiers; natural, mineral or synthetic thickeners as well as emulsion stabilizers
  • Totally unique and elegant sensory profile; “wet-to-powder” transition
  • Ideal vehicle for the delivery of active materials
  • Enhances the feel of basic O/W emulsions; add 5-15% to existing emulsions
  • Outer aqueous design (SiW) allows simple addition of silicone elastomers into formulations
  • Cold process/energy cost savings, great stability, easy handling

 

Energy Savings:

  • To reduce overall manufacturing costs, simply combine phase B to A, no heat required

 

Applications and Suggested Uses:

  • Mainly designed for silicone-in-water dispersion systems; 5-70% application dependent
  • Can be used to improve sensory esthetics of existing emulsions; 5-15% application dependent
  • Skin care, daily wear, color cosmetics, sun care, body care, hair care

This product enhances the esthetic appeal of formulations while also stabilizing the delivery of active ingredients. It further offers benefits in terms of sebum absorption and control. Gransil™ DMG-3's application scope encompasses skin care, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care formulations.

This product excels as an anti-tack agent, carrier, flattener, and sebum regulator, ensuring a smooth, non-tacky, and non-oily texture. Its unique elastomer network extends benefits by offering sebum absorption and control. Additionally, Gransil DM-5 provides a desirable matte appearance with a powdery after-feel.

data.name: Gransil™ RG-12
data.description: Gransil™ RG-12 is a versatile ingredient with multiple functions. Acting as an absorbent, sebum absorber, anti-tack agent, carrier, flattener, and sebum regulator, it offers a range of benefits. These benefits include sebum absorption, non-tacky texture, powdery feel, sebum control, smooth sensation, non-oily touch, and esthetic enhancement. Gransil RG-12 finds utility in personal care applications such as color cosmetics, hair care, skincare, and sun care products.

data.name: Gransil™ GCM-5
data.description: Gransil™ GCM-5 is a dynamic solution for formulations across skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care. This versatile product serves as an anti-tack agent, carrier, flattener, and sebum regulator, enhancing the texture and performance of your creations. Crafted as a volatile, low-viscosity elastomer dispersion in cyclopentasiloxane, Gransil GCM-5 ensures a non-tacky, non-oily, smooth feel. Its stability as a delivery vehicle for active materials and its capacity for sebum absorption and control make it a valuable asset.

data.name: Gransil™ SBG-11
data.description: Gransil™ SBG-11 is a multi-functional product with functions as an anti-tack agent, anti-aging agent, carrier, flattener, moisturizing agent, and sebum regulator. Benefit claims encompass regenerating properties, anti-aging effects, mattifying effects, non-tackiness, powdery feel, sebum control, wrinkle refinement, smooth feel, moisturizing, sebum absorption, sensory enhancement, non-oily feel, and esthetic enhancement. This versatile product is intended for use in personal care applications.

data.name: Gransil™ EPSQ
data.description: Gransil™ EPSQ is a versatile product with functions spanning thickening, flattening, sebum regulation, and viscosity modification. Gransil EPSQ emerges as a hybrid silicone composite powder, ingeniously composed of two interlacing polymer networks: polydimethylsiloxane and polymethylsilsesquioxane (PMSQ). The unique feature lies in their interwoven yet non-covalently bonded molecular-scale arrangement. This product elevates the esthetics of formulations, offering a cost-effective alternative for obtaining elastomer gel-like effects, ultimately transitioning into a matte appearance with a powdery after-feel. Its potential applications encompass skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care formulations.

data.name: Gransil™ EP-LS
data.description: Gransil™ EP-LS is a 99% elastomer powder that promises to transform your creations with its multifaceted benefits. As a versatile thickener, flattener, viscosity modifier, and sebum regulator, it redefines the potential of your formulations. Achieve a desirable matte appearance, oil thickening, cushioning, and cost-performance properties that resonate with excellence. For oil thickening, effortlessly disperse Gransil EP-LS in cyclomethicone, dimethicone, isododecane, and compatible oils.

data.name: Gransil™ ORB-II
data.description: Gransil™ ORB-II is a transformative self-emulsifying elastomer dispersion within cyclopentasiloxane, redefining stability, esthetics, and ease of use. This elevates your formulations with the added dimension of spherical powders, delivering elevated wrinkle correction and soft-focus effects. Discover the possibilities across various personal care segments: color cosmetics, hair care, skincare, sun care, and treatment products.

data.name: Gransil™ SiW-026
data.description: Gransil™ SiW-026 is a versatile solution designed to simplify formulation enhancement. This innovative product serves as an anti-tack agent, flattener, and sebum regulator. Ideal for personal care applications within beauty and care, covering color cosmetics, hair care, skin care, sun care, and treatment products. This empowers formulations with effortless elastomer and powder integration, even in challenging environments. It minimizes or eliminates the need for additional emulsifiers, addressing potential irritation concerns.

data.name: Gransil™ RPS
data.description: Gransil™ RPS is designed to enhance esthetics and performance. As a volatile, high-viscosity elastomer dispersion in cyclopentasiloxane, Gransil RPS is a versatile solution for skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care. Its multi-functional attributes as an anti-tack agent, carrier, flattener, and sebum regulator ensure optimal texture and performance. This product delivers enhanced esthetics, stability as a delivery vehicle for active materials, and sebum absorption and control.

data.name: Gransil™ DMG-2
data.description: Gransil™ DMG-2, a volatile elastomer dispersion in 2cSt dimethicone, redefines the realm of product esthetics. Unleash the power of non-tacky, non-oily, and smooth characteristics as they seamlessly integrate into your creations. With an elastomer network that empowers sebum absorption and control, this product offers a flawless matte appearance with enhanced esthetics. Embark on a journey of innovation across skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care formulations.

data.name: Gransil™ ORB-III-5CS
data.description: Gransil™ ORB-III-5CS serves as an emulsifier (O/W) and an emulsifier. It is labeled as cold processable and delivers excellent non-tacky, non-oily, smooth characteristics. It also offers stable delivery for active materials and features an elastomer network for sebum absorption and control. It transforms into a matte appearance with a powdery after-feel.

data.name: Gransil™ VX-404/S
data.description: Gransil™ VX-404/S is a cosmetic ingredient product with benefit claims of long wear, sensory enhancement, non-tackiness, skin adhesion, stabilizing properties, after-sun repair, repairing capabilities, esthetic enhancement, and moisturizing. This product is designed for the personal care market and is used in skin care and sun care applications.

data.name: Gransil™ PSQ-45
data.description: Gransil™ PSQ-45 is a versatile solution designed to elevate formulations with its anti-caking and water-repellent properties, ensuring enhanced slip, non-thickening effects, and sensory enhancement. Benefit from its ability to impart lubricity and water repellency, making it an excellent addition to a wide range of personal care applications, including color cosmetics, hair care, skincare, sun care, and treatment products.

data.name: Gransil™ DMCM-5
data.description: Gransil™ DMCM-5 is a multi-functional product serving as an emollient, absorbent, viscosity modifier, flattener, re-fattening agent, carrier, sebum regulator, and anti-tack agent. Benefit claims include excellent flexibility, mattifying effects, non-tackiness, longer playtime, powdery feel, sebum control, superior performance, sebum absorption, smooth texture, non-oily feel, and esthetic enhancement.

data.name: Gransil™ DMAM
data.description: Gransil™ DMAM is an elastomer dispersion of dimethicone and caprylyl methicone, redefines the boundaries of excellence. With its exceptional solubilizing power, anti-tack performance, and carrier capabilities, it's the ultimate choice for formulators seeking perfection. Experience the transformation of your creations as Gransil DMAM imparts enhanced esthetics, offering a non-tacky, non-oily, and smooth sensation. Serving as a steadfast and stable delivery vehicle for active ingredients, it seamlessly integrates into skincare, color cosmetics, sun care, and hair care formulations.

data.name: Gransil™ Blur-X11
data.description: Gransil™ Blur-X11 is a dynamic combination of spherical elastomer and soft focus powders. Functioning as both a film former and flattener, this innovation offers instant wrinkle blurring and soft focus effects while effectively masking imperfections and promoting an even skin tone. With its range of benefits, including a mattifying effect, sebum absorption, cushioning, ease of formulation, oil control, and esthetic enhancement, Gransil Blur-X11 is the perfect addition to your skincare regimen.

data.name: Grant Industries
data.description: Grant Industries specializes in the research, development, manufacturing, and marketing of textile, cosmetic, and performance specialty chemicals. We serve all major global cosmetic markets with a portfolio of award-winning products, cutting-edge research and personalized customer care. Our state-of-the-art ingredients are designed to improve your product's skin feel, including polysilicone-11 elastomer gels, silicone/active powders, microsphere powders, surfactants, UV dispersions, specialty silicone fluids and formulated cosmetic ingredients.
